Release details, version LTS.441
Patch LTS.441.4 of December 10, 2024
New features
A new
feature to save entered data
when closing an unsaved object profile was added.
Changes and improvements
In registries, when activating the
registry edit mode
, a tooltip now appears indicating the need to remove focus from the row to save the changes made.
Update package LTS.441.3 of December 6, 2024
New features
1. Users can now independently
define
their preferred method of object opening.
2. Within an object profile, it is now possible to
redefine the action
of the "Save" button. For example, saving and exiting the profile in one click.
1. In the registry editing mode, a new object can now be created by adding a new line, which optimizes the time for filling directories.
2. It is now possible to create the condition tree-based data filtering directly in the object type registry.
The
"General search" widget
settings were updated with the "Search mode" option that allows adjusting the search request using the keyboard.
A new function,
getSignData
, was introduced for retrieving certificate data used in visual stamps for PDF electronic signatures.
With the appropriate
permissions
, it is now possible to manage
sessions
of other users.
An option to display non-printing characters was added.
The maximum size of attached files was added.
1. Users can now get to know all about GreenData directly from the Meeting room.
2. Communication during
GreenData Meet
sessions was improved with the addition of camera, microphone, and audio device configuration options.
Updates with a large number of objects can now be formed via an API by specifying object IDs or fetching them from an SQL-based source.
Additionally, updates can now include only permissions without adding objects themselves.
Sending
email messages
is now supported via the starttls protocol.
It is now possible to specify the response format as "TEXT" on both the data source and the data receiver from an external service.
Timeouts for distributed ETL execution, including task acquisition and processing, can now be set via the
configuration file
.
Changes and improvements
The option to create
bidirectional relations
between attributes with overridden types was improved;
The "Choose instance type field" option for all object attribute visuals was stabilized;
The process of saving objects with
multiselect attributes
was stabilized;
The object filtering in multiselect attributes with the active
"Selecting an object with a text element via a popup window"
option was improved;
The
"Use in Mobile App"
option was debugged;
Applying the specified visual when opening the object profile via the action button was improved;
Snapshot mode object displays were stabilized;
The possibility to preview .docx files was stabilized;
The process of redirecting users with the "Back" button after object deletion was improved;
Now, if the current object is deleted via an action, users are redirected to the object registry without a page reload;
The data in the registry is now updated automatically.
The display of column filters in registries was stabilized;
The logic for displaying registries and opening visuals when clicking on the
main menu item
was improved ensuring compatibility with user access permissions;
When configuring search filters in the registry or the "Global search" widget, users can now redefine the
action on click
within the search result area;
The ability to attach files to the hierarchical element in
"Explorer" widget
is now available only after saving;
The display of the
"Title by attribute" widget
was stabilized to match the styles specified during configuration, and for the "Time" type attribute, the display of the attribute visual setting specified during configuration was adjusted;
The creation of percentage and monetary values in the
"Attribute table" widget
was stabilized;
Styling settings for attribute visual algorithms were debugged;
The
autocalculation
is now recalculated immediately after changing the value in the aggregation attribute or in cases when changing the values in attributes involved in the filtering algorithm;
In the
Condition tree
, filtering by specified types was added. Additionally, the creation of conditions with chained attributes and checking the conditions with an object, transferred through a parameter were stabilized;
The execution of algorithms that use bit operations and classes for working with dates was optimized;
The
reportDatesBetween
function in
visual algorithms
was stabilized;
The functionality of the newExcelWorkbook function was stabilized;
The display of the "Confirm action" button when deleting a dashboard was optimized;
The dashboard
drill-down
decryption was stabilized;
The transfer of
settings
for
the "Linear chart" analytical dashboard
via a GUF file was stabilized;
The business process launch was improved;
Object processing based on schedules was improved for higher stability;
The user trying to access the "Theme designer" without "Read" permissions for theme instances will be redirected to the Start page;
Report generation in the data source was stabilized;
The ability to export an object data source with a hidden field was stabilized;
The migration of
updates
with default values in print forms containing the
color palette
and algorithm in employee profile fields was stabilized;
The
CI/CD
update transfer security was improved;
The connection to an external database was stabilized;
The SSL configuration for establishing a secure connection within integration was stabilized;
Checking for access permissions when working with SQL console was improved;
The application performance when updating the cache was optimized;
Collaborating on the document in the EDoc was stabilized;
In the EDoc module, the application/rejection of edits was improved, including working with the bookmarks when loading a version of a document from a file;
In the Edoc module, the visibility of the "Display comparison results with standard wording" button now depends on the completion of the data source for value comparison;
In the Edoc module, the process of downloading documents from the PDF file preview was debugged;
In
GreenData Meet
, when creating a meeting, the display of a modal window for entering the username and room name was stabilized;
In the
GreenData mobile app
, push notifications are now displayed correctly when switching between applications or users;
The attribute in the "Chatbot connection settings" object type [SYS_CHATBOT_SETTINGS] was optimized.
